name: INSULIN LISPRO
cautions:
Cautions section 6.1.1; children
(use only if benefit likely compared to soluble insulin); interactions: Appendix 1 (antidiabetics)
doses:
By subcutaneous injection shortly before
meals or when necessary shortly after meals, according to requirements
By subcutaneous infusion, or intravenous injection,  or intravenous infusion, according to requirements
